directions: Place a steamer insert into a saucepan and fill with water to just below the bottom of the steamer. Bring water to a boil. Add broccoli florets and carrots, cover, and steam until tender, about 5 minutes.
Transfer vegetables to a bowl; add lemon juice and seasoned salt and toss to coat.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon seasoned salt, or to taste
title: Steamed Broccoli and Carrots with Lemon
